cmeta:modification.rdf:value: Changed the model name so the model loads in the database easier.
Corrected the membrane voltage differential equation.
Updated metadata to conform to the 16/01/2002 CellML Metadata 1.0 Specification.
Changed some equations after using the MathML validator.
Made changes to some of the metadata, bringing them up to date with the most recent working draft (26th September) of the Metadata Specification.
Removed document type definition as this is declared as optional according to the WC3 recommendation.

rdf:Description.dc:publisher: The University of Auckland, Bioengineering Research Group

rdf:Description.dc:title: The Beeler-Reuter Model of Membrane Action Potentials of Mammalian Ventricular Myocytes, 1977

cmeta:comment.rdf:value: This is the CellML description of Beeler and Reuter's mathematical model of membrane action potentials of mammalian ventricular myocardial fibres. It describes four ionic currents in terms of Hodkin-Huxley type equations.

bqs:JournalArticle.dc:title: Reconstruction of the action potential of ventricular myocardial fibres
